system.description: When you read a charged situation, roll with MIND.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, you recognize a weakness in your own position or preparations you should have seen coming.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a hit, ask the MC questions; take +1 ongoing when you act on the answers.

On a 7-9, ask 1.

  • where’s my escape route / way in / way past?
  • which enemy is most vulnerable to me?
  • what should I be on the lookout for?
  • what’s my enemy’s true position?
  • who here can’t be trusted?

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, ask the MC questions; take +1 ongoing when you act on the answers.

On a 10+, ask 2.

  • where’s my escape route / way in / way past?
  • which enemy is most vulnerable to me?
  • what should I be on the lookout for?
  • what’s my enemy’s true position?
  • who here can’t be trusted?
